name: Forgotten (itch) (Virtual Nomad)
description:
Sometimes they just want to be remembered.

  • Match apparitions with their markers.
    • Find the correct resting place for each as they appear on the right by selecting a gravestone on the left in the fewest attempts possible.
  • [Click/Tap] to Select Headstone/Continue.
  • TIP: They all have names, just like you.
  • Still a WIP! Will continue to tinker with this through April.

Originally intended for the AppGameKit Spooky Jam but wasn't playable by the deadline. It's nice to move a WIP into the Finished pile no matter how small the project :)
